text: Sredi nikh yest' takiye, kotoryye obizhayut Proroka i govoryat: «On yest' ukho (vyslushivayet lyubyye novosti)». Skazhi: «On slushayet tol'ko to, chto luchshe dlya vas. On veruyet v Allakha i doveryayet veruyushchim. On yavlyayetsya milost'yu dlya tekh, kotoryye uverovali». Tem zhe, kotoryye obizhayut Poslannika Allakha, ugotovany muchitel'nyye stradaniya
